Trade/Device Name(s): BIO-VENTURE Rapid Multi-Drug Test Easy Cup for OTC Use
BIO-VENTURE Rapid Multi-Drug Test Split Key Cup for OTC Use
BIO-VENTURE Rapid Multi-Drug Test Easy Cup for Rx Use
BIO-VENTURE Rapid Multi-Drug Test Split Key Cup for Rx Use
Regulation Name(s): Cocaine and cocaine metabolite test system
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for BIO-VENTURE Rapid Multi-Drug Test Easy Cup and Split Key Cup for OTC and Rx use for qualitative detection of multiple drugs of abuse in human urine
Indications for Use Summary: Qualitative, preliminary detection of amphetamine, oxazepam, benzoylecgonine, methamphetamine, morphine, and marijuana metabolite in human urine using a rapid lateral flow immunoassay; intended for over-the-counter and prescription use as initial drug screening
